title: L'argent = Money
abstract: Note: Based on the novel 'The forged note' by Tolstoy.
description: A single forged banknote changes hands as a schoolboy prank and follows a remorseless path (the chain reaction of Tolstoy's novella) which culminates in murder. Bresson ignores sociological and psychological explanation in austerely charting the paradoxical path of crime and punishment which leads the murderer towards redemption. Further reading: Film Comment. 'Special Bresson'. May/June and July 1999  Credits: Producer, Jean-Pierre Baste, Patricia Moraz ; director, writer, Robert Bresson ; photography, Emmanuel Manchuel, Pasqualino de Santis ; music, Jean-Sebastien Bach ; editor, Jean-Francois Naudon. Cast: Christian Patey, Caroline Lang, Silvie van den Elsen, Vincent Risterucci.
